title: Defensive Duellist
content:
Class and Dexterity would give you plus one, plus all the other benefits. Good feat to combine with Hunter, or any class proficient with Medium Armor. There are several medium armors that have uncapped AC bonuses from Dexterity. You could possibly have a Ranger as an AC tank while equipping a medium armor. Notes & Tips go here
